I tried that and it came with 20 errors, all related to " cannot find symbol"

item.title: Compiling ERROR PLEASE HELP!
item.dc:creator: @gingerbear gingerbear
item.description:
@gingerbear wrote:

[quote=“koomar, post:1, topic:425073”]I have one error when compiling which is this : src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:1324: error: orphaned case case 8528: //NOmad ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

I tried to add a bracket where I thought was necessary but it didn’t work.

Here is the part where I added the code when I got the error. /** * load spell **/ public void loadSpell2(int i) { npcs[i].attackType = 3; int random = Misc.random(3); if (random == 0) { npcs[i].projectileId = 393; //red npcs[i].endGfx = 430; } else if (random == 1) { npcs[i].projectileId = 394; //green npcs[i].endGfx = 429; } else if (random == 2) { npcs[i].projectileId = 395; //white npcs[i].endGfx = 431; } else if (random == 3) { npcs[i].projectileId = 396; //blue npcs[i].endGfx = 428; } case 8528: //NOmad int n5 = 0; int wrathDamage = c.playerLevel[3]/10 * 3; if (goodDistance(npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY, Server.playerHandler.players[npcs[i].killerId].absX, Server.playerHandler.players[npcs[i].killerId].absY, 2)) n5 = Misc.random(1); else n5 = Misc.random(2); if (n5 == 0) { if(npcs[i].HP <= 15000 && npcs[i].HP >= 12500) { //Ice Barrage npcs[i].forceChat("Die now, in a prison of ice!"); npcs[i].forceAnim(6986);//barrage? npcs[i].attackType = 2; if (c.freezeTimer <= 0){ c.freezeTimer = 15; c.gfx0(369); c.sendMessage("You have been frozen."); } } } else if (n5 == 1) { //Smoke Barrage if(npcs[i].HP <= 25000 && npcs[i].HP >= 22500) { npcs[i].forceChat("Fill My Soul With Smoke!"); c.getPA().appendPoison(160); c.gfx0(391); npcs[i].attackType = 1; c.sendMessage("Nomad fills your lungs with a deathly smoke."); } } else if (n5 == 2) { //Shadow Barrage if(npcs[i].HP <= 20000 && npcs[i].HP >= 17500) { npcs[i].forceChat("Embrace Darkness!"); c.gfx0(382); npcs[i].attackType = 1; c.getPA().walkableInterface(12418); c.sendMessage("You're encased in a unholy shadow."); } } else if (n5 == 3) { //Blood Barrage if(npcs[i].HP <= 10000 && npcs[i].HP >= 7500) { npcs[i].HP += 185; npcs[i].attackType = 2; c.gfx0(377); c.sendMessage("Nomad Saps your health and increases his own."); } } else if (n5 == 4) { //Turmoil if(npcs[i].HP <= 5000 && npcs[i].HP >= 1000) { npcs[i].forceAnim(6326);//turm npcs[i].forceChat("There is...NO ESCAPE!"); npcs[i].hitDelayTimer += 2; } } else if (n5 == 5) { //Wrath if(npcs[i].HP <= 200 && npcs[i].HP >= 0) { npcs[i].projectileId = 0; //melee npcs[i].forceChat("Feel The Wrath Of ZAROS!!"); npcs[i].attackType = 1; npcs[i].forceAnim(2259);//Wrath c.gfx0(2260); c.playerLevel[3] -= wrathDamage; c.handleHitMask(wrathDamage); c.getPA().refreshSkill(3); } } else if (n5 == 6) { //Normal Attack npcs[i].projectileId = 0; //melee npcs[i].attackType = 0; } else if (n5 == 7) { //First! if(npcs[i].HP <= 30000 && npcs[i].HP >= 29900) { npcs[i].projectileId = 0; //melee npcs[i].forceChat("AT LAST!!!!"); npcs[i].attackType = 1; } } }

Hope you can help. Thanks.[/quote]Orphaned case means it’s outside the switch statement, just simply add it in there and you’ll be good to go!

Read full topic

item.title: Compiling ERROR PLEASE HELP!
item.dc:creator: @koomar koomar
item.description:
@koomar wrote:

@echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_01\bin\javac.exe" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java src\server\clip\*.java src\server\clip\region\*.java src\server\model\players\combat\*.java pause

item.title: Compiling ERROR PLEASE HELP!
item.dc:creator: @rrooaarr rrooaarr
item.description:
@rrooaarr wrote:

you started the case after a closed bracket. simply move the closing bracket so that it is after the case

item.title: Compiling ERROR PLEASE HELP!
item.dc:creator: @koomar koomar
item.description:
@koomar wrote:

I have one error when compiling which is this : src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:1324: error: orphaned case case 8528: //NOmad ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

I tried to add a bracket where I thought was necessary but it didn’t work.

Here is the part where I added the code when I got the error. /** * load spell **/ public void loadSpell2(int i) { npcs[i].attackType = 3; int random = Misc.random(3); if (random == 0) { npcs[i].projectileId = 393; //red npcs[i].endGfx = 430; } else if (random == 1) { npcs[i].projectileId = 394; //green npcs[i].endGfx = 429; } else if (random == 2) { npcs[i].projectileId = 395; //white npcs[i].endGfx = 431; } else if (random == 3) { npcs[i].projectileId = 396; //blue npcs[i].endGfx = 428; } case 8528: //NOmad int n5 = 0; int wrathDamage = c.playerLevel[3]/10 * 3; if (goodDistance(npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY, Server.playerHandler.players[npcs[i].killerId].absX, Server.playerHandler.players[npcs[i].killerId].absY, 2)) n5 = Misc.random(1); else n5 = Misc.random(2); if (n5 == 0) { if(npcs[i].HP <= 15000 && npcs[i].HP >= 12500) { //Ice Barrage npcs[i].forceChat("Die now, in a prison of ice!"); npcs[i].forceAnim(6986);//barrage? npcs[i].attackType = 2; if (c.freezeTimer <= 0){ c.freezeTimer = 15; c.gfx0(369); c.sendMessage("You have been frozen."); } } } else if (n5 == 1) { //Smoke Barrage if(npcs[i].HP <= 25000 && npcs[i].HP >= 22500) { npcs[i].forceChat("Fill My Soul With Smoke!"); c.getPA().appendPoison(160); c.gfx0(391); npcs[i].attackType = 1; c.sendMessage("Nomad fills your lungs with a deathly smoke."); } } else if (n5 == 2) { //Shadow Barrage if(npcs[i].HP <= 20000 && npcs[i].HP >= 17500) { npcs[i].forceChat("Embrace Darkness!"); c.gfx0(382); npcs[i].attackType = 1; c.getPA().walkableInterface(12418); c.sendMessage("You're encased in a unholy shadow."); } } else if (n5 == 3) { //Blood Barrage if(npcs[i].HP <= 10000 && npcs[i].HP >= 7500) { npcs[i].HP += 185; npcs[i].attackType = 2; c.gfx0(377); c.sendMessage("Nomad Saps your health and increases his own."); } } else if (n5 == 4) { //Turmoil if(npcs[i].HP <= 5000 && npcs[i].HP >= 1000) { npcs[i].forceAnim(6326);//turm npcs[i].forceChat("There is...NO ESCAPE!"); npcs[i].hitDelayTimer += 2; } } else if (n5 == 5) { //Wrath if(npcs[i].HP <= 200 && npcs[i].HP >= 0) { npcs[i].projectileId = 0; //melee npcs[i].forceChat("Feel The Wrath Of ZAROS!!"); npcs[i].attackType = 1; npcs[i].forceAnim(2259);//Wrath c.gfx0(2260); c.playerLevel[3] -= wrathDamage; c.handleHitMask(wrathDamage); c.getPA().refreshSkill(3); } } else if (n5 == 6) { //Normal Attack npcs[i].projectileId = 0; //melee npcs[i].attackType = 0; } else if (n5 == 7) { //First! if(npcs[i].HP <= 30000 && npcs[i].HP >= 29900) { npcs[i].projectileId = 0; //melee npcs[i].forceChat("AT LAST!!!!"); npcs[i].attackType = 1; } } }

Hope you can help. Thanks.
